company.name: INBlFO Institut fur biologische Forschung GmbH

senderCompany.name: INBlFO Institut fur biologische Forschung GmbH

fax.subject: Scheduling of inhalation studies
fax.message: Piter Terpstra has plotted the optimal schedule for performing up to 4 standard 90 d inhalation assays over 1 year. The meaning of the different blocks on each of the time lines is: 28 d cigarette conditioning + analytical smoking + machine preparation, 90 d 2 and 3. The duration of the following evaluation process depends on the overall load on the labs involved and the extent of endpoints investigated. Please note that we prefer no overlap of the exposures in 2nd to 3rd and in the 4th quarter, because of holidays.
